title: Virtual Assistant - Bookkeeping & Business Operations (Long-term Partnership)
job_overview:
We're seeking an exceptional Virtual Assistant to join our small, dedicated team as a long-term partner. This unique position combines bookkeeping, administrative support, and business operations for a Harvard graduate, Caroline, who runs an operations consulting company, manages an Airbnb, and helps her husband with his program for medical students..

You'll be working closely with Caroline and our existing Virtual Assistant team member in a collaborative environment where attention to detail, initiative, and genuine investment in team success are essential. If you are organized, detail-oriented, like numbers, and are looking for a long-term stable position with someone who is willing to help you learn and grow, this is the role for you!

*Core Responsibilities*
- Bookkeeping & Financial Management (Primary Focus)
   • Process receipts forwarded via Gmail using Wave accounting software
   • Maintain accurate receipt records and categorization in Google Drive
   • Fill out quarterly tax organizers 
   • Complete quarterly occupancy taxes for Airbnb

- Scheduling & Coordination Support
   • Schedule online consultation appointments
   • Email coordination for meetings

- Business Operations Support
   • File forms and applications for Caroline's consulting business
   • Create and maintain Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)
   • Assist with administrative processes
   • Arrange medical student schedules in Google Sheets
   • Use AI to calculate students’ scores using provided evaluations

- Administrative Tasks
   • Calendar management and appointment scheduling
   • Email organization and management
   • Basic research projects and data compilation
   • Shopping research and vendor coordination
   • Document organization and filing

*Required Skills & Qualifications*
- Technical Proficiency & Software Used
   • Wave Accounting: Experienced in receipt processing and categorization (okay if not familiar with Wave, specifically)
   • Gmail: Advanced email management and organization
   • Google Calendar: Scheduling and calendar coordination
   • Notion: Task and project organization
   • Google Sheets: Data entry and spreadsheet management
   • Google Drive: File organization and document management
   • DocHub: Document processing and form handling

- Essential Qualities
   • Professional Communication: Excellent written and verbal English
   • Initiative: Proactive problem-solving and question-asking
   • Attention to Detail: Meticulous accuracy in all tasks
   • Organizational Skills: Natural ability to create and maintain systems
   • Care & Team Investment: Genuine concern for overall team operations and business success, with initiative to suggest 
      improvements and optimizations
   • Proactive Mindset: Looking beyond assigned tasks to identify opportunities for process enhancement
   • Reliability: Consistent availability during required hours

*What Makes This Role Unique*
Unlike typical VA positions, this role will have a range of tasks and exposure to different businesses. You'll be integral to both personal and business operations, requiring:
   • Understanding of basic appointment scheduling and coordination
   • Bookkeeping expertise beyond basic data entry
   • Ability to create and improve business processes
   • Flexibility to handle diverse tasks from receipt management to research projects

- Growth Opportunities
   • Increased hours as business grows (potential for full-time)
   • Skill development across multiple business functions
   • Long-term career partnership with ongoing learning opportunities
   • Stable, supportive work environment with clear communication

- Communication & Work Style
   • Daily availability and communication during overlap hours (7-9 AM Manila Time) via WhatsApp
   • Weekly 15-30 minute video call with Caroline for check-ins and priority alignment
   • Most tasks have 48 hours or more deadlines (rarely urgent)
   • Clear documentation provided for all processes
   • Open communication encouraged - questions are always welcome

*Application Requirements*
To ensure you've read this entire description, please include:
   • Experience Summary: Detail your relevant bookkeeping and administrative experience
   • Long-term Commitment: Why you're seeking a long-term position and what that means to you
   • Initiative Examples: Describe a time you identified and solved a problem proactively
   • Questions: What questions do you have about the role or working together?

IMPORTANT NOTE
This position offers the opportunity to become an integral part of a growing business while developing diverse skills in a supportive, professional environment. Include the phrase meticulous partner in your response. We're looking for someone who shares our values of excellence, continuous learning, and genuine care for quality work.
